T02D1321:249a-1: d'a ki n'i badzra panydzar panytsa d'a ka s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1321:249a-3: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1321:249a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1321:249a-5: 'khor ba gang zhig shing chen po yi yal ga'i tshogs dang mtshungs pa 'di rnams ni //
T02D1321:249a-6: zhe sdang gtso bo'i nyon mongs rnams te 'gro drug rnams kyi skye las rgyal //
T02D1321:249a-7: gang de thub dka'i brtson 'grus la gnas rnam pa lnga yi sku 'chang ba //
T02D1321:249a-8: dus dgra rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'dud //
T02D1321:249a-9: 'gro ba ma lus pa yi 'dod pa mi gcod cing //
T02D1321:249a-10: byang chub la ni nges par 'jug pa lnga'i //
T02D1321:249a-11: 'khor lo rnams ni drang bar ldan pa bri //
T02D1321:249a-12: de dag kyang ni bsod nams ldan pa'i rgyur //
T02D1321:249a-13: chu dang 'bras bu rnyed sla ba dang phug rnams dang //
T02D1321:249a-14: gang yang rung bar 'jam pa'i stan gnas te //
T02D1321:249a-15: sngags pas gzhan gyi dbang du rgyal ba bsgom //
T02D1321:249a-16: blo yi bsam bya bsam par bya ba ni //
T02D1321:249a-17: h'um aom tram ya kham 'di dag ni //
T02D1321:249a-18: snying gar ji lta'i gdan la bsam //
T02D1321:249a-19: bla ma rdo rje mchod pa dang //
T02D1321:249a-20: bdun po rnam par dag par bya //
T02D1321:249a-21: sdig pa bshags par bya ba dang //
T02D1321:249a-22: yang na byed par sdom pa'o //
T02D1321:249a-23: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02D1321:249a-24: bsod nams dag la rjes yi rang //
T02D1321:249a-25: de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya //
T02D1321:249a-26: dkon mchog gsum la yang dag brten //
T02D1321:249a-27: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
T02D1321:249a-28: lam la brten te de nas ni //
T02D1321:249a-29: tshang pa'i gnas bzhi rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D1321:249a-30: sna tshogs stong par bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:249a-31: dngos po bden brdzun rnam dpyad pas //
T02D1321:249a-32: brtags pas dmigs su med pa ste //
T02D1321:249a-33: des ni 'di ltar gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02D1321:249a-34: dngos po thams cad bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:249a-35: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aatma ko& ham /
T02D1321:249a-36: mdun du ra pha las ni nyi ma rnam par bsgom //
T02D1321:249a-37: nyi ma der ni h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
T02D1321:249a-38: rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang gur bcing pa yang ngo //
T02D1321:249a-39: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1321:249a-40: sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:249a-41: der ni h'um yig las byung ba //
T02D1321:249a-42: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam par bya //
T02D1321:249a-43: 'khor zhing rab tu mi g-yo ba //
T02D1321:249a-44: 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs //
T02D1321:249a-45: h'um yig bcu yi sbyor ba las //
T02D1321:249b-0: khro bo bcu ni rim bzhin @249b dgod //
T02D1321:249b-1: shar du gshin rje gshed po bsam //
T02D1321:249b-2: shes rab mthar byed yang ni lhor //
T02D1321:249b-3: padma mthar byed chu bdag ste //
T02D1321:249b-5: 'dod pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan du'o //
T02D1321:249b-6: me nyid du ni dbyug sngon can //
T02D1321:249b-7: bden bral du ni mi g-yo bsam //
T02D1321:249b-8: rlung nyid du yang stobs po che //
T02D1321:249b-9: gtsug tor steng du bsam par bya //
T02D1321:249b-10: 'og tu gnod mdzes rnam par bsgom //
T02D1321:249b-11: kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis te //
T02D1321:249b-12: rdo rje khro bo drag chen po //
T02D1321:249b-13: snying gar khu tshur sdigs mdzub ste //
T02D1321:249b-14: g-yas pa rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar //
T02D1321:249b-15: gshin rje 'joms pa'i tho ba ste //
T02D1321:249b-16: dbyug pa rdo rje gzhan mi thub //
T02D1321:249b-17: rta mgrin gyi ni padma dmar //
T02D1321:249b-19: 'dod pa'i rgyal po lcags kyu ste //
T02D1321:249b-20: dbyug pa sngon po rang ming can //
T02D1321:249b-21: stobs rgyal gyi ni tri sh'u la //
T02D1321:249b-22: mi g-yo ba yi rdo rje'o //
T02D1321:249b-23: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyi //
T02D1321:249b-24: chos kyi 'khor lo bsam par bya //
T02D1321:249b-26: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas //
T02D1321:249b-27: aindra n'i la mtshungs pa'i mdog / gshin rje gshed po bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:249b-28: gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba //
T02D1321:249b-29: zla ba'i 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1321:249b-30: padma'i khro bo dmar chen po //
T02D1321:249b-31: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nag po ste //
T02D1321:249b-32: mtshams kyi khro bo nag po che //
T02D1321:249b-34: gshin rje rnam par snang mdzad nyid //
T02D1321:249b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' dbyug pa la'o //
T02D1321:249b-38: khro bo'i 'khor lo dbus gnas su //
T02D1321:249b-39: bdud las rgyal ba bsam par bya //
T02D1321:249b-41: khro bo bcu ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:249b-42: dpag tshad brgyar ni 'jug pa yis //
T02D1321:249b-43: bgegs rnams skrod par bsam par bya //
T02D1321:249b-44: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1321:249b-45: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:249b-46: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1321:249b-49: me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1321:249b-50: brtul zhugs can gyis chu bsam bya //
T02D1321:249b-51: dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02D1321:249b-52: de yi steng du bsam par bya //
T02D1321:249b-53: dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
T02D1321:249b-54: dbang nyid bsam par bya ba yi //
T02D1321:249b-55: bum yig sangs rgyas rnam par lnga //
T02D1321:250a-0: @250a * // gnas lnga ru ni bsam par bya //
T02D1321:250a-1: rdo rje can dang rtag pa nyid //
T02D1321:250a-2: gsum pa rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1321:250a-3: bzhi pa 'dod chags rdo rje yi //
T02D1321:250a-4: lnga pa rta mchog rgyal po'o //
T02D1321:250a-5: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zlum po ste //
T02D1321:250a-6: rdo rje can gyi zla phyed 'dra //
T02D1321:250a-7: chos kyi rdo rje padma mtshungs //
T02D1321:250a-8: nyi ma yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs //
T02D1321:250a-9: rta mchog dpal ni zhes bya ste //
T02D1321:250a-10: gru gsum kun du de yi'o //
T02D1321:250a-11: rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste //
T02D1321:250a-12: khru bzhi sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1321:250a-13: snang byed kyi yang khru lda'o //
T02D1321:250a-14: padma gar dbang gi ni drug / rta mchog rgyal po dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1321:250a-15: khru bdun pa yi tshad yin no //
T02D1321:250a-16: cha ni brgyad pa nyid kyis na //
T02D1321:250a-17: 'khor lo'i sgo ru rab tu grags //
T02D1321:250a-18: khyud dang lha yi snam bu ni //
T02D1321:250a-19: sgo yi tshad du gzhal bar bya //
T02D1321:250a-20: sgo yi phyed kyi cha yis ni //
T02D1321:250a-21: logs dang 'gram ni nyid yin no //
T02D1321:250a-22: mchod snam nyid kyang de bzhin bya //
T02D1321:250a-23: dra ba dra phyed snam bu yang //
T02D1321:250a-24: tshangs pa'i skud las cha gnyis bor //
T02D1321:250a-25: cha drug par ni bya ba'o //
T02D1321:250a-26: sgo yi tshad tsam de bzhin dor //
T02D1321:250a-27: cha dgu ru ni rab brtags pa'o //
T02D1321:250a-28: sangs rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1321:250a-29: shar gyi shar ni rab tu bstan //
T02D1321:250a-30: lhor ni sangs rgyas nyi ma yi //
T02D1321:250a-31: nub tu rdo rje 'dod chags so //
T02D1321:250a-32: byang du rta yi rgyal po'o //
T02D1321:250a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' dbus su'o //
T02D1321:250a-34: shar du dkar po chen po ste //
T02D1321:250a-36: nub tu dmar por shes par bya //
T02D1321:250a-37: de yi byang du ljang gu'o //
T02D1321:250a-38: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1321:250a-39: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1321:250a-40: thams cad kyi ni grva yi char //
T02D1321:250a-41: sgo dang sgo khyud grva rnams su //
T02D1321:250a-42: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa'o //
T02D1321:250a-43: dbus su padma dkar dmar te //
T02D1321:250a-44: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyor par //
T02D1321:250a-45: rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gdan //
T02D1321:250a-46: rang gi sa bon legs bltas la //
T02D1321:250a-47: 'khor lo'i rnam par bsam par bya //
T02D1321:250a-48: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ni //
T02D1321:250a-49: a'a li gzugs der de gzhug go //
T02D1321:250a-50: lha mo gzugs kyi yan lag ni //
T02D1321:250a-51: gru gsum du ni zla ba blta //
T02D1321:250a-52: skar ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1321:250a-53: ka la sogs pa rab tu gzhug / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang //
T02D1321:250a-54: byang chub zla ba gnyis pa'o //
T02D1321:250a-55: h'um byung rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:250a-57: de ltar so sor nges par ni //
T02D1321:250b-0: phyag mtshan lnga @250b la lnga rab dbye //
T02D1321:250b-1: rdo rje sems la mi phyed pa //
T02D1321:250b-2: rnam snang la ni chos 'khor lo //
T02D1321:250b-3: rin chen rgyal po'i rin chen te //
T02D1321:250b-5: don grub shes rab ral gri ni //
T02D1321:250b-6: shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1321:250b-7: sems dpa'i gzugs su yang dag 'byung //
T02D1321:250b-8: dkyil 'khor bdag por rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1321:250b-9: mkha' 'gro can gyi phyag rgya sogs //
T02D1321:250b-11: m'a ma k'i sogs yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1321:250b-12: dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus nyid do //
T02D1321:250b-13: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul ming can //
T02D1321:250b-14: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs //
T02D1321:250b-15: rang gi lus la zhugs pa dang //
T02D1321:250b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gtso bo'i //
T02D1321:250b-17: srog dang rtsol dang mnyam zhes dang //
T02D1321:250b-19: klu dang rus sbal kri lag can //
T02D1321:250b-20: lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal //
T02D1321:250b-21: sangs rgyas 'khor lo so sor zhu //
T02D1321:250b-22: sa bon brgyad ni bsam par bya //
T02D1321:250b-23: ming gi dang po gam cam sogs //
T02D1321:250b-24: yi ge las ni lha mo 'byung //
T02D1321:250b-26: dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma //
T02D1321:250b-27: za phod sbos mo de bzhin du //
T02D1321:250b-28: ri khrod gtum mo g-yung mo'o //
T02D1321:250b-29: rdo rje rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1321:250b-30: skam pa zhags pa ma nyid dang //
T02D1321:250b-31: rda zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin //
T02D1321:250b-32: me tog la sogs mtshams kyi char //
T02D1321:250b-33: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1321:250b-34: nyi lag ma dang mar me ma //
T02D1321:250b-35: rin chen sgrol ma glog lag ma //
T02D1321:250b-36: sgeg mo la sogs mtshams char ro //
T02D1321:250b-39: gling bum sogs phyogs kyi char //
T02D1321:250b-40: bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so //
T02D1321:250b-41: rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1321:250b-42: rdo rje sgo lcags lde mig ma //
T02D1321:250b-43: sgo glegs ma dang gos 'dzin ma //
T02D1321:250b-44: de bzhin mtshams su spyan sogs so //
T02D1321:250b-45: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bar //
T02D1321:250b-46: sgo skyong sgor ru dgod pa ste //
T02D1321:250b-47: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang //
T02D1321:250b-49: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag kun //
T02D1321:250b-50: rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang bas gnas //
T02D1321:250b-51: snying gar g-yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste //
T02D1321:250b-52: zla ba nyi ma ro steng du //
T02D1321:250b-53: mi bskyod dkyil 'khor phyogs su ni //
T02D1321:250b-54: dkar mo lcags kyu sdigs mdzub ste //
T02D1321:251a-2: ro langs rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02D1321:251a-3: za phod rdo rje dril bu can //
T02D1321:251a-4: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D1321:251a-5: sangs rgyas dbang gyur gzhan du ni //
T02D1321:251a-6: gcig las rim pa bzlog pa'o //
T02D1321:251a-7: pukka s'i sogs lha mo rnams //
T02D1321:251a-8: mtshan ma dang ni mdog bshad bya //
T02D1321:251a-9: byang sems bum pa ri rab dang //
T02D1321:251a-10: me thab rgyal mtshan chen po'o //
T02D1321:251a-11: nag po dkar po nam mkha' mtshungs //
T02D1321:251a-12: khro bo mi bskyod dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D1321:251a-13: me tog dkar po yin te spos //
T02D1321:251a-14: du ba mar me ser po'i 'od //
T02D1321:251a-15: byug pa dmar po l'a sye dag / klu ma ser mo gar ma ljang //
T02D1321:251a-16: bzhad ma dmar mo gling bu ni //
T02D1321:251a-17: ser po pi wang dkar dmar ro //
T02D1321:251a-18: ja 'dzin ljang gu rdza rnga ni //
T02D1321:251a-19: dkar mo rang gi phyag mtshan sbyor //
T02D1321:251a-20: ho yig dmar po 'od zer bcas //
T02D1321:251a-21: gnyis kyi dbus su yi ge gsum //
T02D1321:251a-22: dri yang na ni mnyam par zhugs //
T02D1321:251a-23: zhu bar gyur pas rjes su dran //
T02D1321:251a-24: mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyis kyang //
T02D1321:251a-25: gtso bo la ni glu 'dis bskul //
T02D1321:251a-26: khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong thugs dag cing //
T02D1321:251a-27: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyis lha'i lus yang dag brgyan mdzad pa //
T02D1321:251a-28: pukka s'i ni bdag la myur du gzigs la stong
T02D1321:251a-29: pa nyid spongs shig / khyod ni gti mug rdo
T02D1321:251a-30: rje yongs skyong sku dag cing //
T02D1321:251a-31: gzugs brnyan chos kyis lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa //
T02D1321:251a-32: ri khrod ma ni bdag la mgon pos myur gzigs stong nyid spongs //
T02D1321:251a-33: rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten don phyir skye ba gzigs par mdzod //
T02D1321:251a-34: khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong gsung dag cing //
T02D1321:251a-35: mchog tu so sor rtogs pas lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa //
T02D1321:251a-36: gtum mo bdag la myur du gzigs nas stong pa nyid spongs la //
T02D1321:251a-37: rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten don phyir skye pa bzhes par mdzod //
T02D1321:251a-38: khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong gzugs sku ba //
T02D1321:251a-39: bya ba grub pas thams cad mnyam pas bdag nyid brgyan mdzad pa //
T02D1321:251a-40: g-yung mo bdag la myur du gzigs la stong pa
T02D1321:251a-41: nyid spongs shig / rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten
T02D1321:251a-42: don phyir skye ba bzhes par mdzod //
T02D1321:251a-43: sbos mo sogs kyi gnas 'dug pa'i //
T02D1321:251a-44: me tog la sogs rang gis glus //
T02D1321:251a-45: mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyis bskul //
T02D1321:251a-46: de ltar gtso mo gzhan dag la'ang //
T02D1321:251b-0: bskul @251b te sad pas sngon gyi ni //
T02D1321:251b-1: smon lam dran pa'i stobs kyis te //
T02D1321:251b-2: h'um mam dag las langs par bsam //
T02D1321:251b-3: thugs kye mkha' 'gro stobs chen po //
T02D1321:251b-4: zhal brgyad zhabs ni bzhi pa ste //
T02D1321:251b-5: phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan //
T02D1321:251b-6: dbang sngon lta bu'i 'jigs pa dang //
T02D1321:251b-7: sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs dag ste //
T02D1321:251b-8: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1321:251b-9: rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1321:251b-10: dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste //
T02D1321:251b-11: gnyis ni dkar dang dmar pa'o //
T02D1321:251b-12: spyi bo'i dbus ma gtsigs pa ste //
T02D1321:251b-13: lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs //
T02D1321:251b-14: bdud bzhi po ni mnyam par mnan //
T02D1321:251b-15: spyi bor rdo rje nag po 'dzin //
T02D1321:251b-16: glang po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02D1321:251b-17: mi dang de bzhin seng byi la //
T02D1321:251b-18: g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la //
T02D1321:251b-19: gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya //
T02D1321:251b-20: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02D1321:251b-21: nyi ma zla ba nyid dang ni //
T02D1321:251b-22: mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid //
T02D1321:251b-23: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la'o //
T02D1321:251b-24: gri gug thod pa phyag mtshan pa'i //
T02D1321:251b-25: m'a ma k'i dang gnyis med sbyor //
T02D1321:251b-26: aam lam dag las ltag par dkar //
T02D1321:251b-27: zhal gnyis gnag dang dmar ba'o //
T02D1321:251b-28: zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1321:251b-29: sangs rgyas spyan gyis mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D1321:251b-30: zhabs bzhi la sogs thun mong bas //
T02D1321:251b-31: zhal brgyad la sogs ma bstan to //
T02D1321:251b-32: khang par spyi gtsug 'khor lo sogs //
T02D1321:251b-33: phyag mtshan dag kyang brjod pa'o //
T02D1321:251b-36: rma bya ma he chu srin dang //
T02D1321:251b-37: nya yi rgyal po rus sbal dang //
T02D1321:251b-38: lhag pa'i klu dang ngang pa dang //
T02D1321:251b-39: ri bong ltag pa'i g-yas rnams la'o //
T02D1321:251b-40: rtsangs pa thu bo sbrin shugs dang //
T02D1321:251b-41: mig sman 'dra dang byi ba dang //
T02D1321:251b-42: g-yag dang dri ldan sa ra sa //
T02D1321:251b-43: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad la'o //
T02D1321:251b-44: tram tam dag la rin rgyal ming //
T02D1321:251b-45: sku mdog ser po bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:251b-46: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal nag po //
T02D1321:251b-47: dmar po spyi bor rin chen 'dzin //
T02D1321:251b-48: ka randa dang 'khor lo dag / ne tso dang ni tsa ko ra //
T02D1321:251b-49: byi'u khra hor mo 'ol ba dang //
T02D1321:251b-50: ri skegs rin chen g-yas dag na'o //
T02D1321:251b-51: stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //
T02D1321:251b-53: 'jog po dang ni nor rgyas dang //
T02D1321:252a-2: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser bsregs bzhin //
T02D1321:252a-3: sgrol ma yis ni mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D1321:252a-4: aam pam dag las bzhengs shing dmar //
T02D1321:252a-5: rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:252a-6: g-yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste //
T02D1321:252a-7: g-yon pa zla 'od dri ma med //
T02D1321:252a-9: gos dkar mo dang gnyis med sbyor //
T02D1321:252a-10: dom dang bya rgod de bzhin bse //
T02D1321:252a-11: ba men dang ni stag nyid dang //
T02D1321:252a-12: spre dang chu srin ce sbyang dag / rdo rje chos kyi g-yas dag la'o //
T02D1321:252a-13: bya rog 'ug pa chu skyar ser //
T02D1321:252a-14: sa ra sa dang de bzhin ra //
T02D1321:252a-15: ri dags phag pa thod pa rnams //
T02D1321:252a-16: g-yon ba dag tu rtag tu gnas //
T02D1321:252a-17: tam kham dag las bzhengs shing ljang //
T02D1321:252a-18: rta rgyal rta gdong dran par bya //
T02D1321:252a-19: spyi bor ral gri dkar po 'chang //
T02D1321:252a-20: sgrol ma yis ni mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D1321:252a-21: g-yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste //
T02D1321:252a-22: g-yon pa'i zla 'od dri ma med //
T02D1321:252a-23: gza' lhag phur bu mjug rings dang //
T02D1321:252a-24: sgra gcan mig dmar nyi ma dang //
T02D1321:252a-25: spen pa zla ba thod rnams su //
T02D1321:252a-26: rta yi rgyal po g-yas dag tu'o //
T02D1321:252a-27: dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag /'dod lha dang ni thod pa 'dzin //
T02D1321:252a-28: gcer bu dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1321:252a-29: stobs ldan zhes bya g-yon na'o //
T02D1321:252a-30: lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis brjod //
T02D1321:252a-31: gri gug thod pa nyid yin no //
T02D1321:252a-32: rdo rje nyid kyi thams cad kyi //
T02D1321:252a-33: snying gar ye shes gnas dgod bya //
T02D1321:252a-34: ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1321:252a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub bya //
T02D1321:252a-36: rang sngags yi ge mtshan ma dang //
T02D1321:252a-37: phyag rgyar btags pa las byung pa //
T02D1321:252a-38: dam tshig snying gar ye shes te //
T02D1321:252a-39: bsnyen pa'i sbyor bar rab btags ba'o //
T02D1321:252a-40: aom dharmma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252a-41: ye shes 'khor lo rang dkyil la //
T02D1321:252a-42: lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug cing //
T02D1321:252a-43: gzhug pa dang ni bcing ba dang //
T02D1321:252a-44: mnyes pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:252a-45: spyan la gti mug rdo rje dgod //
T02D1321:252a-46: zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba gnyis //
T02D1321:252a-47: sna la ser sna rdo rje dang //
T02D1321:252a-48: ngag la 'dod chags rdo rje can //
T02D1321:252a-49: phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin lus //
T02D1321:252a-50: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1321:252a-51: phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin //
T02D1321:252a-52: sna tshogs gzugs can btsun mo rnams //
T02D1321:252a-53: phyag gnyis gri gug mgo bo ste //
T02D1321:252a-54: srog song steng du yang dag gnas //
T02D1321:252a-55: mkha' spyod dang ni sa spyod gnyis //
T02D1321:252b-0: @252b de bzhin zhabs 'og gnas pa mo //
T02D1321:252b-1: thugs dang gsung dang sku dag la //
T02D1321:252b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ger dran //
T02D1321:252b-3: aom khe tsa ri badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252b-4: de bzhin du bh'u tsa ri badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252b-5: de bzhin du p'a t'a la b'a si ti sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ma //
T02D1321:252b-7: gsum dang rdo rje ma sogs lnga //
T02D1321:252b-8: rig ma brgyad po de rnams kyis //
T02D1321:252b-9: mkha' 'gro dbang bskur rab tu grags //
T02D1321:252b-10: mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1321:252b-11: dam tsheg lnga yis gang ba yin //
T02D1321:252b-12: bum pas rig ma brgyad pa yis //
T02D1321:252b-13: mkha' 'gro lnga la dbang bskur te //
T02D1321:252b-14: bzhi pa spyi bor 'khor lo dang //
T02D1321:252b-16: thugs kyi mkha' 'gro'i spyi bor ni //
T02D1321:252b-17: sangs rgyas lnga ni 'dzin par bsgom //
T02D1321:252b-18: de rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor pa //
T02D1321:252b-19: rdo rje'i rjes rim dkyil 'khor kun //
T02D1321:252b-20: thugs dang rtag pa rin chen dang //
T02D1321:252b-21: dpag med lha mo'i spyi bor 'dzin //
T02D1321:252b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sva bh'a wa aatma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252b-23: g-yo zhing 'bar bas thod pa ru //
T02D1321:252b-24: lcags kyu'i sa bon lnga las byung //
T02D1321:252b-25: lce la rdo rje nas 'bras tsam //
T02D1321:252b-26: rdo rje bdud rtsi myong ba'o //
T02D1321:252b-27: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta sva da badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1321:252b-28: ye shes las ni mchod sna tshogs //
T02D1321:252b-29: brgyad po nges par phyung ba yis //
T02D1321:252b-30: lha mos 'khor lo la ni mchod //
T02D1321:252b-31: 'khor lo'i bdag nyid gtso bo la'o //
T02D1321:252b-32: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252b-33: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor //
T02D1321:252b-34: khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyis mchog ni yongs brnyes te //
T02D1321:252b-35: khyod kyis rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun sgrub cing //
T02D1321:252b-36: snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad par mdzad //
T02D1321:252b-37: sgyu ma'i spros pas dgos pa sgrub pa po //
T02D1321:252b-38: he ru ka dpal thugs ni dgyes pa ste //
T02D1321:252b-39: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1321:252b-40: gzhal yas sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1321:252b-41: dbang ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1321:252b-42: bdud rtsi myang ba snang mtha' yas //
T02D1321:252b-43: bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan dpal //
T02D1321:252b-44: mchod pa don yod grub par brjod //
T02D1321:252b-45: rjes su chags pa rdo rje sems //
T02D1321:252b-46: yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1321:252b-47: rang byin brlabs pa rab tu grub //
T02D1321:252b-48: grub pa'i sngon du mtshan ma rnams //
T02D1321:253a-0: @253a * // rim pa mngon du mtshon par bya //
T02D1321:253a-1: dang po sprin dang 'dra bar snang //
T02D1321:253a-2: gnyis pa du ba lta bu ste //
T02D1321:253a-3: gsum pa me khyer rnam pa la //
T02D1321:253a-4: bzhi pa mar me gsal ba'o //
T02D1321:253a-5: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
T02D1321:253a-6: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
T02D1321:253a-7: phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste //
T02D1321:253a-8: rmi lam rnam pa skad cig yin //
T02D1321:253a-9: snying ga'i nang song zla ba ni //
T02D1321:253a-10: zla ba'i gzugs la mi shigs pa //
T02D1321:253a-11: sna tshogs 'od zer gyis ni bskor //
T02D1321:253a-12: de las rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1321:253a-13: rdo rjes bdag med mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1321:253a-14: bsgoms te cho ga yis ni bskul //
T02D1321:253a-15: mkha' 'gro ma yi sna yi mthar //
T02D1321:253a-16: yungs kar rnam pa bsgom pa ni //
T02D1321:253a-17: 'gro ba thams cad yungs kar la //
T02D1321:253a-18: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02D1321:253a-19: de ltar yid kyis sgom byed pa'o //
T02D1321:253a-20: rang byin brlab par rab grub pa'o //
T02D1321:253a-21: ru dr'aksha dung bse ru dang //
T02D1321:253a-22: bo de tse dang bad 'bras bu //
T02D1321:253a-23: mu tig sogs dang byi ru la //
T02D1321:253a-24: bsam gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas bya //
T02D1321:253a-25: aom dha ra dha ra dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya //
T02D1321:253a-27: badzra dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1321:253a-29: ae hi ae hi dzin dzi ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1321:253a-30: aom badzra s'u rya ta mo ba ti ma na sa ma ya stvam aa ham //
T02D1321:253a-31: ratna dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1321:253a-32: aom badzra dha rm'a sa ma ya st'am hu lu hu lu a'a ro li ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1321:253a-33: aom phu phu phu hi hi pra dzny'a dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1321:253a-34: gang tshe rnal 'byor bsam gtan du be //
T02D1321:253a-35: de tshe dag pa rjes su dran //
T02D1321:253a-36: snying rje yis ni spyan dag dmar //
T02D1321:253a-37: spyan gyi rnam dag rdo rje gsum //
T02D1321:253a-38: zhal rnams rnam thar brgyad po yin //
T02D1321:253a-39: phyag ni stong pa bcu drug go //
T02D1321:253a-40: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pos ni //
T02D1321:253a-41: zhabs ni bzhi po brjod pa'o //
T02D1321:253a-42: phyag rgya yis ni sangs rgyas lnga //
T02D1321:253a-44: bden pa rnam pa bzhi pos ni //
T02D1321:253a-45: rus pa ru ni yongs gyur pa'o //
T02D1321:253a-46: gzugs pung rdo rje ma ru gyur //
T02D1321:253a-47: tshor bar gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
T02D1321:253a-48: 'du shes de bzhin chu ma ste //
T02D1321:253a-50: rnam shes nyid ni bdag med ma //
T02D1321:253a-51: phung po don dam par ni med //
T02D1321:253a-52: skye mched drug tu 'gyur ba ni //
T02D1321:253a-53: zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje ma //
T02D1321:253a-54: chu ma ro yi rdo rje yin //
T02D1321:253a-55: phrag dog rdo rje gti mug ma //
T02D1321:253a-56: rdo rje rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1321:253a-57: ser sna gsang pa'i goo r'i ma //
T02D1321:253a-58: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1321:253a-59: sa ni pukka s'i ru brjod //
T02D1321:253a-60: chu khams ri khrod ma ru'o //
T02D1321:253b-0: me ni gtum mor @253b shes bya ste //
T02D1321:253b-1: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu grags //
T02D1321:253b-2: gzugs ni dkar mor rtag tu bshad //
T02D1321:253b-3: sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags //
T02D1321:253b-4: dri yi cha la ro longs ma //
T02D1321:253b-5: ro la ghasma r'i yi gzugs //
T02D1321:253b-6: reg las spyod ma ru brjod //
T02D1321:253b-7: chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma'o //
T02D1321:253b-8: glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin smyo //
T02D1321:253b-9: khong skran mdze dang rkang shu dang //
T02D1321:253b-10: mchin pa mchir pa'i rang bzhin kyang //
T02D1321:253b-11: glang po la sogs rab tu grags //
T02D1321:253b-12: rdzi ma 'byi dang so nad dang //
T02D1321:253b-13: mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung //
T02D1321:253b-14: bad kan 'dzag dang lus gas dang //
T02D1321:253b-15: skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs //
T02D1321:253b-16: rkang bam tshil nad rlig skrangs dang //
T02D1321:253b-17: rgyu ma 'phel dang lhog pa dang //
T02D1321:253b-19: ka randa sogs rab tu grags //
T02D1321:253b-20: brjed byed dang ni pho mtshan lcags //
T02D1321:253b-21: chu sri ba dang rdo chu can //
T02D1321:253b-22: bshang nad skran dang sgro nad dang //
T02D1321:253b-23: mig ser ngom la sogs pa'o //
T02D1321:253b-24: rlung dang mkhris pa ma zhu ba //
T02D1321:253b-25: skya rim rab rib mchil mas gang //
T02D1321:253b-26: gzhog phyed na dang lkog 'bras dang //
T02D1321:253b-27: rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o //
T02D1321:253b-28: lhag ma rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs //
T02D1321:253b-29: bsdus pa ru ni bsam par bya //
T02D1321:253b-30: 'dod don grub par byed dang bgegs //
T02D1321:253b-31: zhi bar byed dang dge bar ro //
T02D1321:253b-32: sngags dang phyag rgyas yang dag dgug / lha sogs phyir na gtor ma bya //
T02D1321:253b-33: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1321:253b-35: dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam //
T02D1321:253b-36: mthar byed lho ru dgod pa'o //
T02D1321:253b-37: chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la //
T02D1321:253b-38: byang du gnod sbyin dgod par bya //
T02D1321:253b-39: mer ni byin za chen po nyid //
T02D1321:253b-40: bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhin no //
T02D1321:253b-41: rlung du gnas med bsam par bya //
T02D1321:253b-42: dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso //
T02D1321:253b-43: zla nyi tshangs pa lha tshogs dang //
T02D1321:253b-44: tshangs pa yi ni rig pa mchog / tshangs pa mdun na 'don nyid dang //
T02D1321:253b-45: dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang //
T02D1321:253b-46: rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang //
T02D1321:253b-47: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas nyid dang //
T02D1321:253b-48: gang zhig 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1321:253b-49: dag pa'i gnas su gang gnas dang //
T02D1321:253b-50: bde ba can du yang dag gnas //
T02D1321:253b-51: 'og min gnas su gnas pa dang //
T02D1321:254a-2: de kun steng du bsam pa ste //
T02D1321:254a-3: chos 'byung gi ni nang song ba'o //
T02D1321:254a-4: stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //
T02D1321:254a-5: de bzhin mtha' yas nor rgyas bu //
T02D1321:254a-6: 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang //
T02D1321:254a-8: lha min dmyal ba thams cad de //
T02D1321:254a-10: aom las tshangs pa la sogs lha //
T02D1321:254a-11: h'um yig las ni ma chags sogs //
T02D1321:254a-12: aa las stobs kyi rgyu la sogs //
T02D1321:254a-13: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis rnams so //
T02D1321:254a-14: steng gi lha rnams dkar po che //
T02D1321:254a-15: dbang po la sogs nag po mtshungs //
T02D1321:254a-16: stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che //
T02D1321:254a-17: rang mtshungs rig mas lus sprad ldan //
T02D1321:254a-18: lag gnyis rdo rje dril bur 'brel //
T02D1321:254a-19: g-yas brkyang ba yi stan la gnas //
T02D1321:254a-20: tshangs sogs rtag pa'i phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1321:254a-21: mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis //
T02D1321:254a-22: stobs kyi rgyu sogs gar dbang ste //
T02D1321:254a-23: kun kyang rigs gsum las skyes so //
T02D1321:254a-24: dkar mo yis ni dgug pa nyid //
T02D1321:254a-25: chom rkun ma yi zhags pa gzhug / ro langs ma ni lcags sgrog 'ching //
T02D1321:254a-26: za phod dril bus dbang du byed //
T02D1321:254a-27: de nas mchod yon zhal bsil sbyin //
T02D1321:254a-28: sngags 'di yis ni dbul bar bya //
T02D1321:254a-31: sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya //
T02D1321:254a-32: aom badzra stva sa ma ya /
T02D1321:254a-34: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1321:254a-36: su to shyo me bha wa /
T02D1321:254a-37: su po shyo me bha wa /
T02D1321:254a-38: aa nu ra kto me bha wa /
T02D1321:254a-39: hri da ya mme aa dhi ti shtha sarbba siddhim me pra ya tstsha /
T02D1321:254a-40: sarbba ka rma su tsa me tsi tatm shre ya:
T02D1321:254a-41: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bhaga wa'n
T02D1321:254a-42: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me mu nyta
T02D1321:254a-43: badzr'i bha wa ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:
T02D1321:254a-44: mu:/ nyi shu gnyis kyi lha rnams tshogs dag dang //
T02D1321:254a-45: dkyil 'khor lnga yi gtso bo mkha' 'gro lnga //
T02D1321:254a-46: byas pa'i bsod nams thob pas dge ba rnams //
T02D1321:254a-47: des ni 'gro rnams mkha' 'gro lngar byed shog / mi thub zla ba'i gsung gis rnam spras pas //
T02D1321:254a-48: dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga yi rgya mtsho rnams //
T02D1321:254a-49: dpa' rlabs chen po bcom par gyur pa ni //
T02D1321:254a-50: rmongs pa'i yul rnams med pa ru ni gyur //
T02D1321:254a-51: mi thub zla bas rnam par spras pa'i mkha' 'gro lnga'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02D1321:254a-53: // / rgya gar mkhan po li la badzra dang /
T02D1321:254b-0: bod kyi lo ts'a bsod nams @254b rgyal mtshan gyis //
T02D1321:254b-1: rang gi dam chos gsal bar byed pas na //
